casebody.data:
William H. SIMON, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 21, 1924.) No. 258. Biek, Godnick & Freedman, of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Louis R. Bick and Fred Francis Weiss, both of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Ralph G. Greene, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Wm. A. De Groot, Asst. U. S. Atty. of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.'

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
